title: New coronavirus treatment helps the infected get better WITHIN DAYS - St. Lucia News Online
content: The authors wrote: ‘This pilot study on [convalescent plasma] therapy shows a potential therapeutic effect and low risk in the treatment of severe COVID-19 patients. ‘One dose of [convalescent plasma] with a high concentration of neutralizing antibodies can rapidly reduce the viral load and tends to improve clinical outcomes.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, there is a risk that this page is not credible!
